data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Rotherham get the game underway.
Michael Ihiekwe (Rotherham) has received a yellow card from Jarred Gillett.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
It's Blackburn with the kick-off after the break.
Blackburn's Barry Douglas has been booked in Blackburn.
In the minute 59, Amari Bell is replacing Barry Douglas for the home team.
Blackburn make their second substitution with Stewart Downing replacing Joe Rothwell.
Goal! Michael Smith gives Rotherham a 0-1 lead in Blackburn.
In the minute 65, Jamie Lindsay is booked for the away team.
Lewis Holtby is replacing John Buckley for Blackburn at Ewood Park.
Tom Trybull is on a sub for Bradley Johnson for Blackburn.
In the minute 70, The away team replace Michael Smith with George Hirst.
Rotherham make their second substitution with Freddie Ladapo replacing Kyle Vassell.
The away team replace Ben Wiles with Wes Harding.
In the minute 81, Harvey Elliott gets an equalizer for Blackburn. The score is now 1-1.
Tyrhys Dolan is on a sub for Sam Gallagher for Blackburn.
The match has come to a close in Blackburn. The final score is 2-1.
Ryan Nyambe (Blackburn) has received a first yellow card.
Billy Jones is replacing Daniel Barlaser for the away team.
At Ewood Park, Billy Jones has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Adam Armstrong is on target to give Blackburn a 2-1 advantage.
